1101110010101100 0110100100110011 1 -> sum: 0100010111100000, cout: 1
1010111001101001 0000111000110000 0 -> sum: 1011110010011001, cout: 0
1111101000011000 1010111001001101 1 -> sum: 1010100001100110, cout: 1
1100100011100000 0000001110010001 1 -> sum: 1100110001110010, cout: 0
0001101010000101 1010101001101011 0 -> sum: 1100010011110000, cout: 0
0110001001110011 0001110011010001 0 -> sum: 0111111101000100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
